Published November 2 2014

Skype Translator demo

Skype Translator demo — Microsoft is demoing a real time speech translation (via on-screen captions) for video chats over Skype. Nothing is available for the public yet, unless you get approved for the trial, but this is downright impressive technology.

Enjoy your day.
